body_html:
@soumith Thanks for responding quickly. Here are the outputs:

(gdb)  r -c "import torch"
Starting program: /usr/bin/python -c "import torch"
[Thread debugging using libthread_db enabled]
Using host libthread_db library "/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libthread_db.so.1".
[New Thread 0x7ffff344a700 (LWP 18605)]
[New Thread 0x7ffff2c49700 (LWP 18606)]
[New Thread 0x7ffff0448700 (LWP 18607)]
[New Thread 0x7fffedc47700 (LWP 18608)]
[New Thread 0x7fffeb446700 (LWP 18609)]
[New Thread 0x7fffe8c45700 (LWP 18610)]
[New Thread 0x7fffe6444700 (LWP 18611)]
[Thread 0x7ffff344a700 (LWP 18605) exited]
[Thread 0x7ffff2c49700 (LWP 18606) exited]
[Thread 0x7ffff0448700 (LWP 18607) exited]
[Thread 0x7fffeb446700 (LWP 18609) exited]
[Thread 0x7fffe8c45700 (LWP 18610) exited]
[Thread 0x7fffe6444700 (LWP 18611) exited]
[Thread 0x7fffedc47700 (LWP 18608) exited]
[Inferior 1 (process 18600) exited normally]

ldd: /usr/bin/../lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/_C*.so: No such file or directory

Furthermore, I've noticed that none of my python folders contains site-packages.

ls $(dirname $(which python))/../lib/python3.6/si*

> /usr/bin/../lib/python3.6/signal.py         
> /usr/bin/../lib/python3.6/site.py
> /usr/bin/../lib/python3.6/sitecustomize.py

body:
@soumith Thanks for responding quickly. Here are the outputs:

```
(gdb)  r -c "import torch"
Starting program: /usr/bin/python -c "import torch"
[Thread debugging using libthread_db enabled]
Using host libthread_db library "/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libthread_db.so.1".
[New Thread 0x7ffff344a700 (LWP 18605)]
[New Thread 0x7ffff2c49700 (LWP 18606)]
[New Thread 0x7ffff0448700 (LWP 18607)]
[New Thread 0x7fffedc47700 (LWP 18608)]
[New Thread 0x7fffeb446700 (LWP 18609)]
[New Thread 0x7fffe8c45700 (LWP 18610)]
[New Thread 0x7fffe6444700 (LWP 18611)]
[Thread 0x7ffff344a700 (LWP 18605) exited]
[Thread 0x7ffff2c49700 (LWP 18606) exited]
[Thread 0x7ffff0448700 (LWP 18607) exited]
[Thread 0x7fffeb446700 (LWP 18609) exited]
[Thread 0x7fffe8c45700 (LWP 18610) exited]
[Thread 0x7fffe6444700 (LWP 18611) exited]
[Thread 0x7fffedc47700 (LWP 18608) exited]
[Inferior 1 (process 18600) exited normally]

```


`ldd: /usr/bin/../lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/_C*.so: No such file or directory
`

Furthermore, I've noticed that none of my python folders contains site-packages.
```
ls $(dirname $(which python))/../lib/python3.6/si*

> /usr/bin/../lib/python3.6/signal.py         
> /usr/bin/../lib/python3.6/site.py
> /usr/bin/../lib/python3.6/sitecustomize.py

```
